home.everyPurchase: Every purchase you make supports a greener future, enhancing your life while protecting our planet.
home.enhancing: enhancing your life while protecting our planet.
home.signature: Shop guilt-free knowing that our eco-friendly e-commerce platform is committed to reducing environmental impact and promoting sustainable practices in every step of the shopping process

1.title: 1 Million
1.description: GreenShop has recycled and reintroduced over one million items into the market, contributing to waste reduction and promoting the circular economy.

2.title: 8 Million
2.description: Every year, over 8 million tons of plastic waste end up in our oceans, harming marine life and ecosystems.

3.title: 2 Million
3.description: With every purchase, a portion of our profits goes towards planting trees, resulting in over 2 million trees planted globally.

4.title: 200 Tons
4.description: Thanks to our eco-friendly products, we have helped our customers save more than 200 tons of CO2 by reducing the carbon footprint of their purchases.

footer.newsletter: Subscribe now and start making a difference!
footer.newsletterText: Be the first to know about exclusive offers, eco-tips, and new arrivals!
footer.newsletterTextMain: Join our GreenShop community and be the first to know about our latest eco-friendly products, exclusive discounts, and tips.

product.newArrivalsSub: Be the first to have the first-call product
product.mostWantedSub: Good for Environment, Good for You
